column4: Ive doing a bit of reading up on the Hardy LTS release and there seems to be a lot of bad press about it(Samba etc), have things ironed themselves out now? or should I go Ibex? Comments anyone?
Hardy will have updates as long as it is supported, Intrepid is an intermediate release
so which would I be better off going for? Intrepid/Hardy - Any major changes?
Hardy is the more prudent choice for the time being
